CustomField.description: Unit Price field for Conga Quotes/Contracts, shows Unit Amount based on Product Subscription Frequency field
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Unit_Price__c), CASE( Product_Subscription_Frequency__c, "Daily", Daily_Unit_Amount__c , "Monthly", Monthly_Unit_Amount__c , "Intermittent", Unit_Price__c , SBQQ__NetTotal__c/SBQQ__Quantity__c ), Unit_Price__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Unit Price field for Conga Quotes/Contracts that shows Unit Amount based on Product Subscription Frequency
CustomField.label: Unit Price Display
